events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate through our careers portal.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on keywords like software engineer and developer experience.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to manage this candidate’s hiring process for the software engineer vacancy.
Initial screening was conducted via phone call to assess the candidate’s basic skills and motivation for the software engineering role.
The candidate promptly responded to the screening summary and expressed strong interest in proceeding to technical interviews.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to evaluate coding skills, problem-solving abilities, and system design knowledge.
